bioghist.p: Doris Hastings Darnell (b. 1916) and May Shanfeng Chow were both 1939 graduates of Bryn Mawr College. Darnell was a librarian at the Westtown School Library, also working briefly at Bryn Mawr and Haverford. She worked for the American Friends Service Committee in the personnel department from 1964 to 1978. May Chow returned to China after graduating from Bryn Mawr. She was an English teacher.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the papers of Doris Darnell. Materials include correspondence, family photographs, school records, documents relating to her jobs at the Bryn Mawr, Haverford, the Westtown School libraries, financial records, documents relating to her work in the Personnel Department of the American Friends Service Committee, correspondence from her children, Betts, John, and Eric, and travel journals and photographs. Of note is her sixty-year correspondence with May Chow, a fellow Bryn Mawr graduate.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.
